Package org.drip.spaces.iterator

Class RdReceedingStateSpaceScan

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.drip.spaces.iterator.RdSpanningStateSpaceScan
      • org.drip.spaces.iterator.RdReceedingStateSpaceScan
  • public class RdReceedingStateSpaceScan
extends RdSpanningStateSpaceScan
    RdReceedingStateSpaceScan is the Abstract Iterator Class that contains the Functionality to conduct a Receeding Scan through a Rd Space.

    • Module = Numerical Core Module
    • Library = Statistical Learning Library
    • Project = Spaces
    • Package = Iterator


    Author:
    Lakshmi Krishnamurthy
